description: Zorua was captured along with its friend Zoroark by Kodai. It managed to escape but got separated from Zoroark. It was rescued by Satoshi and his friends from falling off a cliff and with their help it was able to be reunited with its friend Zoroark. Zorua is able to use its Illusion ability to be able to transform into things it sees around it. It transformed into Satoshi, Takeshi, Pikachu and Hikari, although none of them enjoyed having duplicates of themselves. It is able to use telepathy to communicate with humans. After Kodai was stopped, it returned home with Zoroark.
name: Zorua
